description: Ministry of Provincial Councils and Local Governments - Orders made to dissolve the Thamankaduwa Pradeshiya Sabha for the purpose of constitution of Polonnaruwa Municipal Council and Polonnaruwa Pradeshiya Sabha w.e.f. 30.06.2017 and to declare the area in Thamankaduwa D/S Division and Administrative Limits and consistence of members of Polonnaruwa Municipal Council and Polonnaruwa Pradeshiya Sabha
